Function reference

NEMO-MEDUSA

Summarising extracted model output.

NM_boundary_summary()
Summarise NEMO-MEDUSA Output into Time Series Along Transects
NM_decadal_summary()
Summarise NEMO-MEDUSA Output into Decadal Grids This function averages cleaned NEMO-MEDUSA monthly summaries into decadal grids.
NM_volume_summary()
Summarise NEMO-MEDUSA Output into Time Series Within Model Compartments This function averages NEMO-MEDUSA monthly summaries into time series for each model compartment.
boundaries()
Create a series of transects along the boundaries of model compartments
to_segments()
Interpolate vertical water movements to the boundary depth between shallow and deep compartments
characterise_flows()
Check if a segment runs parallel to latitude or longitude
decadal()
Prepare for Averaging by Decade
strip_ice()
Strip Snow and Ice Variables at Depth
point_plot()
Map Spatial Summaries
ts_plot()
Plot Temporal Summaries
stick_plot()
Create Stick Plots to Show Currents

Misc

Other assorted utilities.

execute()
Run an R Script in it's own Session Informatively
fill_in()
Fill missing values in a vector
sfc_as_cols()
Pull Coordinates from a Simple Feature Geometry Column
box_zoom()
Zoom a ggplot to the bounding box of an sf object
Window()
Get Indices to Use When Clipping netcdf Files at Import
get_SPM()
Extract Suspended Particulate Matter data from Globcolour
get_air()
Get Surface Irradiance & Air Temperature
get_air_dt()
Get Surface Irradiance & Air Temperature
get_cropped_fishing()
Import Fishing Effort Within Specified Areas
get_rivers()
Get Rivers
update_boundary_period() update_physics_period()
Re-parameterise a Driver File for a Time Period in the MiMeMo Domain

Unit conversions

Helper functions to avoid introducing bugs when switching between scales

micro_to_full() full_to_micro() micro_to_milli() milli_to_micro() milli_to_full() full_to_milli() l_to_m3() m3_to_l() sec_to_day() day_to_sec() shortwave_to_einstein()
Helper functions for common unit conversions

Sediment

Water movements

Align tidal and wave data from different sources.

reshape_SINMOD()
Subset a SINMOD file to depth-averaged water velocities in an area.
get_tides_ts()
Calculate bed shear stress at a location
get_waves_ts()
Calculate bed shear stress at a location
get_bed_shear_stress()
Calculate bed shear stress at a location
sample_tides_year()
Calculate bed shear stress at a location
sample_waves()
Calculate bed shear stress at a location
vectors_2_direction()
Convert a U-V velocity field to speed and direction in degrees

Sediment properties

Calculate derived properties from sediment fractions.

mud_to_permeability()
Calculate sediment permeability
D50_to_porosity()
Calculate sediment porosity
